TI: [The behavioral characteristics of rats induced by partial degeneration of the hippocampal cholinergic neurons].
AB: The effects of intraventricular administration of ethylcholine aziridinium ion (AF64A) were studied in male Wistar rats. Bilateral injections of AF64A (3 nm/3 mcl) reduced the reactions to biological alarm signal and produced a decrease in the open-field activity 3 weeks after this lesion. The lesioned rats also displayed deficit in retention of a passive avoidance task.
AD: Institute of Higher Nervous Activity and Neurophysiology, Russian Academy of Sciences, Moscow.
TT: Osobennosti povedeniia krys, vyzvannye chastichnoi degeneratsiei kholinergicheskikh neironov gippokampa.
TA: Zh Vyssh Nerv Deiat Im I P Pavlova
JT: Zhurnal vysshei nervnoi deiatelnosti imeni I P Pavlova
SO: Zh Vyssh Nerv Deiat Im I P Pavlova. 1998 Jan-Feb;48(1):130-4.
